ZA7562 Eurobarometer Sample

Source: R/data-za7562_sample.R
ZA7562_sample.Rd

A reduced part of a raw GESIS file to demonstrate changes in variable labels and variable names.

ZA7562_sample

Format

A data frame with 5074 rows in 50 variables:

doi

DIGITAL OBJECT IDENTIFIER

version

GESIS ARCHIVE VERSION & DATE

uniqid

UNIQUE RESPONDENT ID (CASEID BY KANTAR COUNTRY CODE)

isocntry

COUNTRY CODE - ISO 3166

p1

DATE OF INTERVIEW

p2

TIME OF INTERVIEW

p3

DURATION OF INTERVIEW

p4

N OF PERSONS PRESENT DURING INTERVIEW

p5

RESPONDENT COOPERATION

d7

MARITAL STATUS

d8

AGE EDUCATION

d25

TYPE OF COMMUNITY

d60

DIFFICULTIES PAYING BILLS - LAST YEAR

qa3_6

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: EUROPEAN UNION

qa3_6

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: EUROPEAN UNION

qa3_6

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: EUROPEAN UNION

qa3_1

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: MEDIA

qa3_1

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: MEDIA

qa3_1

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: MEDIA

qa3_4

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL GOVERNMENT

qa3_4

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL GOVERNMENT

qa3_4

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL GOVERNMENT

qa3_5

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL PARLIAMENT

qa3_5

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL PARLIAMENT

qa3_5

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: NATIONAL PARLIAMENT

qa3_2

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: POLITICAL PARTIES

qa3_2

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: POLITICAL PARTIES

qa3_2

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: POLITICAL PARTIES

qa3_3

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: REG/LOCAL PUBLIC AUTHORITIES

qa3_3

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: REG/LOCAL PUBLIC AUTHORITIES

qa3_3

TRUST IN INSTITUTIONS: REG/LOCAL PUBLIC AUTHORITIES

d71_1

POLITICAL DISCUSSION - NATIONAL MATTERS

d71_2

POLITICAL DISCUSSION - EUROPEAN MATTERS

d71_3

POLITICAL DISCUSSION - LOCAL MATTERS

qc9.1

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: FAMILY

qc9.2

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: FRIENDS

qc9.3

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: DOCTOR ETC

qc9.4

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: OTHER HEALTH CARE WORKERS

qc9.5

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: PHARMACISTS

qc9.6

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: ONLINE SOCIAL NETWORKS

qc9.7

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: OTHER INTERNET SITES

qc9.8

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: HEALTH AUTHORITIES

qc9.9

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: OTHER (SPONT)

qc9.10

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: NONE (SPONT)

qc9.11

VACCINE INFO SOURCES: DK

qc10

MOST TRUSTED VACCINE INFO SOURCE

d77

POLITICAL DISCUSSION - CONVINCE FRIENDS

w1

WEIGHT RESULT FROM TARGET (REDRESSMENT)

w3

WEIGHT GERMANY

wex

WEIGHT EXTRAPOLATED POPULATION AGED 15+

@source Eurobarometer 91.2, March 2019, ZA No. 7562 on gesis.org @seealso label_normalize for text normalization and label_suggest for canonisation.
